alert.note: Alert for Northern Cayuga; Oswego; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 10:46AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF OSWEGO...WAYNE...AND NORTHERN CAYUGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow lake effect snow will continue across southern Oswego County, far northern Cayuga, and far northeast Wayne counties through midday. This band of heavy lake effect snow will produce snowfall rates of around 2 inches per hour at times. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1042 AM EDT, a band of heavy snow was located from near Wolcott east to Martville, Hannibal, Phoenix, and Central Square. The band of snow will remain nearly stationary or possibly drift slowly south through midday. The band of snow is expected to weaken by early afternoon. Travel will be very difficult in this band, with very poor visibility and snow covered roads. This includes Interstate 81 from Brewerton to Parish, and Route 481 from Fulton to the Onondaga County line. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
